title: Sion + Hydra/Tiamat Active Bug

replies.body: Yeah you are correct when he uses the crescent active it displays an idle animation.

> Activating Crescent does not reset the auto-attack timer. Rather, the effect uses the champion's auto attack animation to display the effect. 
> 
>     Crescent casts faster as you gain more attack speed. 

Probably due to Sion's AA animation being too slow causing him to look like getting stuck for a moment.

EDIT: Or prob you triggered the "slapping" aa animation which he sometimes do, and since Crescent uses aa timer but faster it finished before he even executes most of his normal aa animation so looks like he got stuck. But idk, I don't read their codes.
